name: Zombies, Aliens, and Robots
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for Friday Night Game Jam #2020-37

Per the jam rules I only used this randomly generated color pallette: https://coolors.co/231123-a7d49b-ffcab1-628395-3f6c51

REMEMBER:

Zombies beat Aliens

Aliens beat Robots

Robots beat Zombies

P.S. There is a bug where the game will continue on forever past the tenth round or if you run out of money but I ran out of time to fix it so if that happens I order you to stop playing. I will fix it once the jam ends.
